title: Home by Fannie Mae
body:
## We were engaged to generate awareness to potential homebuyers, highlight the features and benefits, drive installation and usage of their new app.

Fannie Mae’s first mobile app — HOME by Fannie Mae — launched in early July to answer questions that people may have about the home buying process. We were engaged to generate awareness to potential homebuyers, highlight the features and benefits, drive installation and usage of their new app.

![Home by Fannie Mae](/images/uploads/home-by-fannie-mae-mobile-pres.jpg)
